<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_ui_policy"><catalog_ui_policy action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><catalog_conditions>IO:4a5634841b71e51080feea02f54bcbb7=Conference Center^EQ</catalog_conditions><catalog_item display_value="Room Reservation">fdc27c801b71e51080feea02f54bcb3f</catalog_item><conditions/><description/><global>true</global><inherit>false</inherit><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><model_id/><model_table/><on_load>true</on_load><order>100</order><reverse_if_false>true</reverse_if_false><run_scripts>true</run_scripts><script_false><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
		//Number of Anticipated Event Attendees
g_form.setMandatory('number_of_anticipated_event_attendees',false);
g_form.setMandatory('number_of_niaid_attendees',false);
g_form.setMandatory('number_of_non_niaid_attendees',false);
g_form.setMandatory('room_setup',false);
g_form.setMandatory('how_many_people_need_to_be_seated',false);
g_form.setMandatory('garden_level_monitors',false);
g_form.setMandatory('meeting_level_monitors',false);
//g_form.setMandatory('describe_event_in_2_to_3_sentences',false);
g_form.setMandatory('formatter4',false);
g_form.setMandatory('open_to_niaid_staff',false);
g_form.setMandatory('open_to_the_public',false);
g_form.setMandatory('open_to_registrants',false);
g_form.setMandatory('do_you_have_a_co_host',false);
g_form.setMandatory('co_host_organization_s',false);
g_form.setMandatory('is_food_catering_needed',false);
g_form.setMandatory('are_foreign_nationals_attending',false);
g_form.setMandatory('do_you_have_an_outside_sponsor',false);
g_form.setMandatory('outside_sponsor_name_s',false);
g_form.setMandatory('formatter2',false);
g_form.setDisplay('number_of_anticipated_event_attendees',false);	
	//Number of Anticipated Event Attendees

}]]></script_false><script_true><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
//Number of Anticipated Event Attendees
g_form.setDisplay('number_of_anticipated_event_attendees',true);	
g_form.setMandatory('number_of_anticipated_event_attendees',true);
g_form.setMandatory('number_of_niaid_attendees',true);
g_form.setMandatory('number_of_non_niaid_attendees',true);
g_form.setMandatory('room_setup',true);
g_form.setMandatory('how_many_people_need_to_be_seated',true);

g_form.setMandatory('meeting_level_monitors',true);
g_form.setMandatory('describe_event_in_2_to_3_sentences',false);
g_form.setVisible('describe_event_in_2_to_3_sentences',false);
g_form.setMandatory('formatter4',true);
g_form.setMandatory('open_to_niaid_staff',true);

g_form.setVisible('outside_sponsor_name_s',false);
	g_form.setMandatory('formatter2',true);
g_form.setDisplay('number_of_anticipated_event_attendees',true);	
	//Number of Anticipated Event Attendees

}]]></script_true><set_values/><short_description>Conference center Number of Anticipated Event Attendees</short_description><sys_class_name>catalog_ui_policy</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bassem</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-24 16:11:06</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>31cf95d91bb12d1080feea02f54bcb43</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Conference center Number of Anticipated Event Attendees</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="OWS Meet" source="x_g_nioa_ows_meet">c67fe0cc1b31e51080feea02f54bcb32</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OWS Meet">c67fe0cc1b31e51080feea02f54bcb32</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_ui_policy_31cf95d91bb12d1080feea02f54bcb43</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bassem</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-21 20:27:47</sys_updated_on><table/><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_ui_policy></record_update>
